name: Ext_R4_Extension_value
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Extension.value[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Extension.value[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](https://hl7.org/fhir/extensibility.html) for a list).
element.comment: `Extension.value[x]` maps to R4B `Extension.value[x]`. Type `Meta` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The version specific identifier, as it appears in the version portion of the URL. This value changes when the resource is created, updated, or deleted.
element.comment: `Extension.value[x]` maps to R4B `Extension.value[x]`. Type `Meta` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Identifies where the resource comes from
element.definition: A uri that identifies the source system of the resource. This provides a minimal amount of [Provenance](https://hl7.org/fhir/p.html#) information that can be used to track or differentiate the source of information in the resource. The source may identify another FHIR server, document, message, database, etc.
element.comment: `Extension.value[x]` maps to R4B `Extension.value[x]`. Type `Meta` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
